prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that wields a bone and has a playful demeanor.
I want a bipedal Pokemon with a skeletal theme and a fierce battle stance.
Generate an orange and white Pokemon that is known for its connection to the earth.
Make a unique Pokemon that wears a skull as a helmet and has a strong personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in caves and has a striking bone weapon.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the ground with earthy colors.
Show me a Pokemon with a distinctive bone structure and a playful, yet fierce nature.
